summary: Tested 6 specific improvements to GuessIt platform - verified login error handling and homepage caching, but encountered issues accessing My Predictions features

flaky_endpoints.issue: My Predictions page routing issues - may not be properly accessible after authentication
flaky_endpoints.impact: Prevents testing of remaining 4 improvements (Points section, league names, red/green styling, optimistic UI)

ui_bugs.issue: My Predictions page (/predictions) redirects to homepage even after authentication
Vote buttons are disabled (prediction closed) preventing testing of optimistic UI feature

integration_issues.issue: After successful login/register, My Predictions page not accessible

passed_tests: Login error handling - shows 'Email or password is incorrect' instead of technical JSON errors
Homepage caching - matches (113) load instantly from cache without loading indicator
Backend API endpoints working correctly (94.4% success rate)
Homepage loads properly with match cards
Vote buttons present but disabled due to prediction closure
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix My Predictions page routing issue - /predictions route not accessible after authentication, preventing verification of 4 remaining improvements (Points section, league name truncation, red/green styling, optimistic UI). Also investigate why vote buttons are disabled.
